sections.installation:
If this plugin was not distributed as a dependancy with a premium theme you need to install it manually. To do that follow the steps below:

Manual install from Dashboard

  • Log into WordPress and navigate to the 'Plugins' screen
  • Press the 'Add New' button in the plugins dashboard
  • Navigate to the 'Upload' area
  • Select polygon-plugin.zip from your computer and click 'Install Now'
  • Locate 'Polygon Plugin' in the list and click 'Activate'

Manual install using FTP

  • Upload polygon-plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Log into WordPress and navigate to the 'Plugins' screen
  • Locate 'Polygon Plugin' in the list and click 'Activate'
